articles.author: Kenneth Fox
articles.title: Twitter announces layoffs at Dublin office with 50% of staff expected to be impacted - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: Twitter employs around 500 people at its European headquarters at their Cumberland Place office in Dublin.

articles.author: Stuart Lau
articles.title: China’s Xi warns Putin not to use nuclear arms in Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Chinese leader makes the call during a visit by German Chancellor Olaf Scholz.
articles.content: TAIPEI Chinese leader Xi Jinping made his most direct criticism yet of Vladimir Putin’s war on Ukraine on Friday, warning the Russian president not to resort to nuclear weapons and calling on visitin… [+4171 chars]

articles.author: Erin Handley
articles.title: Australia under pressure to sanction Myanmar military after Amnesty International report and leaked ANZ Bank transactions - ABC News
articles.description: Australia is an outlier among like-minded countries, including the United States, United Kingdom, Canada and the European Union, all of which have imposed tough sanctions on Myanmar's military rulers since the coup on February 1 last year.
articles.content: The Australian government is under pressure to impose sanctions on Myanmar's military junta and activists are calling on ANZ Bank to reconsider its dealings in the South-East Asian nation amid new re… [+9817 chars]
